summary:
This Mod alters the random way in which the radiant quests are given in Dawnguard to increase the likelihood that the special radiant quests will be the ones given.
It does not add, change or remove any quests, it modifies the chances of the existing quests appearing.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Century Gothic][size=4][color=red][b][center]**** Dawnguard is required for this Mod ****[/center][/b][/color][/size]

[size=2]This Mod alters the random way in which the radiant quests are given in Dawnguard to increase the likelihood that the special radiant quests will be the ones given.
It does not add, change or remove any quests, it modifies the chances of the existing quests appearing.[/size]

[size=3][color=orange][u]Installation/Uninstallation[/u][/color][/size]
[size=2]To install simply download and activate using NMM or download the file manually, unpack with 7-zip and drop the plugin into your Skyrim Data folder, then ensure that it is activated in your Data files.

To uninstall, simply use NMM to uninstall or delete the file from your Skyrim Data folder.[/size]

[size=3][color=orange][u]Load Order[/u][/color][/size]
[size=2]Make sure to add this AFTER anything else that alters Dawnguard Radiant Quests.[/size]

[size=3][color=orange][u]Changelog[/u][/color][/size]

[size=2][color=yellow]Version 2[/color]
-    Complete rewrite as discovered a more efficient method of implementation with less conflicts.[/size]

[size=2][color=yellow]Version 2.1[/color]
-    Updated to Skyrim 1.9 format
-    Included fix for vanilla bug in Hunter radiant quest assignment[/size]

[size=2][color=yellow]Version 2.2[/color]
-    Added the Vampire quest \"The Gift\" to the \"special\" quests[/size]

[size=3][color=orange][u]Final Comments[/u][/color][/size]
[size=2]I would like to thank the Nexus community for the support and encouragement that spurred me on to create this Mod, Sydney666 is mostly to blame ;) and most especially to Eckss for all of his help and advice.[/size][/font]
author: Nemesis The Warlock
